content: **crocheted hat in drops paris the piece is worked top down with double crochets and an edge of lobster stitch around the brim ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-917 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl fits head-size 54/56 - 58/60 cm **yarn** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150-150 g colour 68 almond **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm **crochet gauge** 16 double crochets in width and 18 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
